author: steven
msg: CB-8555 tools and windows release blog posts

author: brane
msg: Remove platform-specific thread-local storage magic from the C test
driver; use APR's threadkey API instead.
(thread_local): Remove. (Incidentally, this is a C++11 keyword.)
(set_cleanup_poo): New; abstracts the definition of the global cleanup pool.
(get_cleanup_pool, null_threadkey_dtor): New, defined only if APR_HAS_THREADS.
(cleanup_pool): Macro wrapper for get_cleanup_pool() if APR_HAS_THREADS.
(test_thread): Use set_cleanup_pool instead of direct assignment.
(svn_test_main): Initialize thread-local storage in threaded mode.
Use set_cleanup_pool instead of direct assignment.

author: erick
msg: cleaned up inadvertent luceneMatchVersion in solrj/solr/multicore/core[0|1]/conf/solrconfig.xml files
